title: Tromb T1 Pearl Free Watch Face
summary: Beautiful and lightweight, the perfect Watchface to show everybody your style.
description: THIS IS THE FREE EDITION OF TROMB T1 GOLD - PREMIUM FEATURES ARE AVAILABLE IN THIS WATCHFACE UNTIL YOU GO IN AMBIENT MODE FOR 5 TIMES, THEN YOU WILL RETURN TO FREE FEATURESBeautiful and lightweight, the perfect watchface to show everybody your style.It is battery friendly without loosing style and features.-Neat design.-Realistic and smooth reflections based on movement.*PREMIUM (Demo mode available)-Constant upgrades adding new features.-Realistic seconds hand movement (physically accurate). *PREMIUM (Demo mode available)-Square watchface support.-Date and day dial.-Battery dial.UPCOMING:-Lot of performance improvements-Customizable Dials.-Presets.-Interactive watchface (chronometer).Compatible with any smartwatch, optimized to be as lightweight as possible
descriptionHTML:
THIS IS THE FREE EDITION OF TROMB T1 GOLD - PREMIUM FEATURES ARE AVAILABLE IN THIS WATCHFACE UNTIL YOU GO IN AMBIENT MODE FOR 5 TIMES, THEN YOU WILL RETURN TO FREE FEATURES

Beautiful and lightweight, the perfect watchface to show everybody your style.

It is battery friendly without loosing style and features.

-Neat design.
-Realistic and smooth reflections based on movement.*PREMIUM (Demo mode available)
-Constant upgrades adding new features.
-Realistic seconds hand movement (physically accurate). *PREMIUM (Demo mode available)


-Square watchface support.

-Date and day dial.
-Battery dial.

UPCOMING:
-Lot of performance improvements
-Customizable Dials.
-Presets.
-Interactive watchface (chronometer).

Compatible with any smartwatch, optimized to be as lightweight as possible
recentChanges: -Demo mode: you will enjoy premium features until you go ambient for 5 times
